entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Drifting snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Drifting snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
